comments.comment: The file is not a regular WAVE_FORMAT_PCM (this is currently the only one supported by TF), but instead an instance of WAVE_FORMAT_EXTENSIBLE <denchmark-link:https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/mmreg/ns-mmreg-waveformatextensible>https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/windows/win32/api/mmreg/ns-mmreg-waveformatextensible</denchmark-link> ; see bytes 21 and 22 which contain instead of . Therefore, TensorFlow cannot handle it (but yes, the error message is suboptimal).
